channel.title: class on Thomas Lazarus
channel.description: Recent content in class on Thomas Lazarus

item.title: Database Systems Final Project
item.description: Collaborated with two other students to create a library application Front-end is written in C# and the database is SQL Allows users to check-in, checkout, and put items on hold Link to Github Repository

item.title: Object Oriented Programming Final Project
item.description: Wrote this project in C# using Object-Oriented techniques to create classes and other data structures Wrote unit tests to test every part of backend code Wrote both a front-end application and web-page using Razor Pages Link to Github Repository
